dict.acceptation: 宏大的，宏伟的；（最）重要的；豪华的；

sent.orig: Grand piano. Stretch to change length from grand to concert grand size.
sent.trans: 大钢琴。可拉伸以改变其长度，从小型钢琴变为平台大钢琴。

sent.orig: The classification in St-Emilion is complex. Do not confuse St.-Emilion-Grand-Cru and St.-Emilion-Grand-Cru-Classé fewer and much better.
sent.trans: 圣爱美浓的葡萄酒等级相当复杂。比如不要混淆圣爱美浓特级和圣爱美浓传统特级，两者相差很大，后一种更好。

sent.orig: This grand literature will be the mother river of moisture behind series of grand army.
sent.trans: 盛大文学这条母亲河将滋润盛大后面一系列的大军。然而河的源头在哪里？

sent.orig: The Grand View Garden is,so to speak,a grand stage for main characters to act.
sent.trans: 大观园是《红楼梦》中主要人物活动的重要场所。

sent.orig: After grand game IPO is finished, grand plan withholds his large stockholder status.
sent.trans: 在盛大游戏IPO完成后，盛大计划保留其大股东地位。
